alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Power (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 1:58PM MDT until August 13 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Oneida County in southeastern Idaho... Southeastern Power County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 158 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Fort Hall Bannock Peak, or 20 miles southeast of Neeley, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Arbon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
